section.title: Understanding privileges
section.p: If you are trying to do something in ThoughtSpot, and cannot access the screens to accomplish it, you may not have the correct privileges. In this case, you should contact your administrator and explain what you want to accomplish. Your administrator may be able to grant you additional privileges.
Here are the privileges that the administrator sets, and the capabilities they enable:
The following table shows the intersection of user privilege and ability: {% include content/security-matrix.md %}
